questions.question: What should you do when approaching a school bus with flashing red lights?
options: Slow down and proceed with caution
Stop at least 20 feet away and wait until lights stop flashing
Pass on the left side only
questions.explanation: Texas law requires you to stop at least 20 feet away from a school bus with flashing red lights and wait until the lights stop flashing before proceeding.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in a school zone when children are present?
questions.explanation: In Texas, the speed limit in school zones is 20 mph when children are present or when flashing lights indicate reduced speed.
